bibl.title: Grenfell and Hunt on the Dates of Early Christian Codices: Setting the Record Straight. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Origin of the Criticism. - Recent Formulations of Roberts' Criticism. - The Pre-History of Roberts' Criticism. - Eric G. Turner's Version of the Criticism. - Grenfell and Hunt's Early Thoughts on the Christian Codex. - Conclusion. "Their [i.e. Grenfell and Hunt's] palaeographical opinions involving Christian codices have been unfairly marginalized."
bibl.seg: NONGBRI Brent, Grenfell and Hunt on the Dates of Early Christian Codices: Setting the Record Straight. Avec résumé en anglais.

Introduction. - The Origin of the Criticism. - Recent Formulations of Roberts' Criticism. - The Pre-History of Roberts' Criticism. - Eric G. Turner's Version of the Criticism. - Grenfell and Hunt's Early Thoughts on the Christian Codex. - Conclusion. "Their [i.e. Grenfell and Hunt's] palaeographical opinions involving Christian codices have been unfairly marginalized."
